page.title: 13A FAVOURITE DAY
page.content: The day of the week I look forward to most is Wednesday.I get up earlier than I normally do,and put my swimming trunks on.I make my way to school and after register we travel to Faversham swimming pool. In the pool we warm up with six widths holding a float in front,followed by four widths on our backs with a float.People who can swim go up the twelve-feet end to do their length.I don't like having to jump in the deep end. We go back to work for the rest of the day,but at lunchtime we play games such as cricket,tennis and football. In the evening I play table-tennis during winter,and cricket club in the summer.The day is rounded off with BBC's Mid-Week Sports Special.
